game.name: Ninja Hero Runner
game.description:
We have tried to get you covered with a brand new adventure challenge. Join Ninja Hero Runner and get ready to help little and cute ninja escape fast. Completing this dungeon testing is not as difficult as it seems to be. All you need to do is keep your eyes on the screen to pass through all the hurdles and assist ninja to reach his destination. Your job in this one of the best running games for boys is play the role of a ninja who is determined to survive as long as possible.?

Try to avoid obstacles of all kinds and collect as many coins as you can to improve your score. Your performance in the game will depend on how long you will survive. You might be disturbed by the mist. So be ready to overlap some objects if required. Make sure to avoid unfriendly creatures and spikes that will be available on the ground. This simple and cool HTML5 game is designed to all those who love running over the platform.?

It is up to you how to make ninja feel proud on you by showing your skillful. Collect all the shiny materials, create the highest possible score and become an unbeatable ninja warrior in this free online running games. Do not need to bother if the result does not go into your favour. Keep playing this ninja runner game until you create the best outcome. All the best to try several more interesting and challenging skill games on our free online game website. Good luck for your outstanding performance.?
